content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and provide instructions for building both structures.

The image shows two separate structures:

Structure 1 (Left):
- Made of orange cylinders as base supports
- Yellow horizontal block on top
- Orange triangular/wedge piece on top
- 3 layers total

Structure 2 (Right):
- Two vertical yellow rectangular blocks as sides
- Green rectangular blocks on top and bottom
- Red cube/block in the middle
- 3 main vertical sections

Let me provide the assembly instructions for each structure:

For Structure 1 (Left):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 9 (vertical orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 9 (second vertical orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 6 (horizontal yellow block on top)
    Step4: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular piece)
}

For Structure 2 (Right):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 4 (horizontal green block for base)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (vertical yellow block - left side)
    Step3: Move block with index 8 (vertical yellow block - right side)
    Step4: Move block with index 2 (red cube in middle)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (horizontal green block for top)
}

The blocks are used exactly as they appear in the dictionary, maintaining their original orientations. Some blocks (like the green horizontal block #4) are used multiple times in the second structure.
